Posts.Content: I’ve one mole on chest like since years. It looks bigger to me. It doesn’t look uneven but scabbing. Not sure about that too cuz it’s basically a light brown and dark brown center with broken kinda part. I’ve a pain in armpit too. Can’t see any swollen nose though. I’ve a pain in the area of gallbladder since so long. I’m going to get it checked out this month. What this mole possibly can be? Does it sound like cancer? It’s flat not ozzing neither bleeding. I’ve some prominent veins around it. It’s on the right side of my body. Please help! Im so worriedÂ
Posts.Title: Mole on chest
